comments.body: The reason I make it lowercase is because `x` is not a regular type parameter, it's only scoped inside the type param list. I saw `x` used in the same situation here: https://github.com/OlivierBlanvillain/monadic-html/blob/de78d4b147e39f5fdec300cce4c2b68e3596bf3a/monadic-html/src/main/scala/scala/xml/xml.scala#L180-L182
